3.title: About the Event
3.text: TEDx talk is a multi day event where people gather to listen their favorite persona and gain a level of compassion and dedication for anything related to daily life, professional life or even social life.

4.title: Why to Attend
4.text: Learn about the benefits, opportunities and exposure that come from exhibiting your business in Startup Alley — from founders just like you. Now, 2020 is a year like no other — not exactly a newsflash, right? Digital Startup Alley may be virtual, but the connections and opportunities that come from exhibiting there are very real.
